report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-30138 Microsoft Windows Print Spooler Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-30138 Microsoft Windows Print Spooler Vulnerability
text: Microsoft Windows Print Spooler could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by a flaw in the Print Spooler component. By executing a specially-crafted program, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with higher privileges.

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-30138 Microsoft Windows Print Spooler Vulnerability

text: Microsoft Windows 7 SP1 x32 Microsoft Windows 7 SP1 x64 Microsoft Windows Server 2012 Microsoft Windows 8.1 x32

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-30138 Microsoft Windows Print Spooler Vulnerability
text: Use Microsoft Automatic Update to apply the appropriate patch for your system, or the Microsoft Security Update Guide to search for available patches.
